metadataAttributes.Title: DevOps on AWS Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Launch your career in DevOps. Master DevOps methodologies and AWS services to deliver faster and more reliable updates to your customers
metadataAttributes.Skills: Continuous Integration, Devops, Monitoring and Logging, Continuous Delivery, Microservices, AWS Identity and Access Management, Networking on AWS, AWS Management Console, Cloud Computing, aws security, Test Automation, AWS cloud,
